bug.author: yassine-labidi
bug.summary: Uninstalling kubeflow 1.0.2 (GCP) leaves a dangling ssl certificate
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened:
Installed kubeflow 1.0.2 (gcp_iap manifest) Then proceeded to uninstall it Listed the ssl certificates: gcloud beta compute ssl certificates list Certificate was still there and active
What did you expect to happen: The ssl certificate would be deleted as part of the uninstallation process Environment:
Kubeflow version: 1.0 kfctl version: 1.0.2 Kubernetes platform: GKE Kubernetes version: v1.14.10-gke.46

comments.comment:
